title: Random FPS Drops (Help please!?)
body:
Hello! I currently am having issues during gameplay where my FPS will randomly drop from a smooth 60 FPS to lows sometimes as bad as 9-20 FPS for several seconds during teamfights and things like that. 

Current specs are:

Nvidia GTX 1080
I7-6700K (4Ghz)
32 GB 1866 Ghz Ram
Samsung 950 pro SSD

I have been experiencing this issue for a while now, and so I did a full computer wipe and restore to Windows 10 to see if it would help the issue. Even on a clean install it's still doing this. Any help anyone could provide would be appreciated. I have already updated all the drivers on the computer as well. I'm stumped. It makes no sense at all.

replies.body:
It's interesting that your frames are dropping after a reformat.  Make sure to use our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide just in case to help make sure your drivers are up to the current version.

If you continue running into issues, download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs and submit them in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can work with you to figure out what's going on.
